That I hereby request the appropriato consular authorities at Dublin, Ireland to grant a visa undor tho Immigration and Nationality Act to: NAME ADDRESS DATE & PLACE OF BIRTH RELATIONSHIP Mrs. Mary Josephine Kilkelly Ryehill, Galway July 5, 1903 sister Ireland +Ireland That My sister is dosirous of coming to the United Statos for pormanent residence. That I por- sonally promiso and agree that during my lifetimo, I will savo tho Unitod Statos and all states, torritorios, countios, towns, municipalitios and districts thoroof harmloss against any lossos or damagos which may be suffored by tho reason of tho fact that any of the persons above montioned during thoir alionage shall bocomo a public charge in tho United Statos.
